Description:
Make Your Start Here
Now here is a home for those buyers that are looking to make a start in the property market as a 1st home buyer, those with young families, investors or those choosing to start downsizing or retirement.
Nestled in a quiet part of Croydon South this brick veneer single level home offers you 3 good sized bedrooms, the main has 4 large built in robes.
Polished hardwood floors will start your journey through the home as you discover 3 separate living areas that consist of spacious lounge room at the front taking in views over the garden, then to the family room next to the kitchen and meals area at the rear.
The kitchen is centrally located and well equipped with plenty of bench and cupboard space to ensure the chef of the family makes their kitchen rule at any meal time.
Before we take in what outside has to offer we mustn't forget other internal features such as gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ceiling fans, two wall air conditioners, polished hardwood floors, carpets in all bedrooms for comfort, modern bathroom, 2 separate toilet, attic storage in the roof plus light filled interiors with freshly painted neutral colours.
The undercover outdoor entertaining patio off the meals area has full view from the kitchen window so children can play safely under the watchful eye of Mum & Dad.
It will be perfect year round to enjoy family gatherings, parties, casual BBQ's, cool afternoon drinks or a leisurely weekend breakfasts with a coffee and the paper.
Car accommodation is well taken care of in the garage/enclosed carport that has a remote controlled roller door with easy access undercover to the house. There is also 2 car space at the front for extra cars.
The gardens are well established yet low maintenance for the avid gardener to enjoy.
All this is within walking distance to schools, parkland's, playgrounds, shopping, Croydon central and all other amenities.
Making a start will begin by booking your viewing today.

Description:
Stylish, distinct and designed to inspire.
Stylish and distinct, this beautifully renovated home encapsulates all that defines contemporary living, with every detail having been carefully curated to provide an exceptional lifestyle. This home is surprising to say the least.
Beyond the tranquil landscaping and undeniably appealing rendered façade, the home promises to immerse the family in quality appointments and finishes spread across a single-level floorplan, achieving a perfect balance between indoor and outdoor living, designed for entertaining and relaxation.
As soon as you enter, you feel like you've finally arrived home. A fusion of neutral tones and hardwood floor creates a comfortable vibe in the L-shaped lounge and dining. Large windows have been thoughtfully placed to create sight lines to the arresting garden, while another benefit is the inclusion of split system air-conditioning to ensure seasonal relief.
Promising an effortless cooking experience, the galley-style kitchen showcases superb stainless steel appliances; 900mm dual fuel cooker and dishwasher, as well as generous storage space and an adjoining meals area with French doors that open up to a covered deck. The outdoor entertaining zone expands out further to a sitting area which oversees the park-like gardens – the feeling of seclusion is total.
All three bedrooms are zoned off the hall and offer a peaceful retreat from a busy schedule. The master is graced with a premium walk-in robe, extensively fitted with abundant drawers and shelving. The luxurious full ensuite showcases an impressive collaboration of design elements that come together to create the ultimate bathing experience, featuring; a decadent dropped ceiling with lighting, semi-frameless rain shower, wall-hung vanity with soft-close drawers, quality tapware, glamourous highlighting of porcelain tiles and underfloor heating.
The bathroom echoes the same quality and style as the ensuite, boasting immediate eye-catching appeal, including the adoption of expansive floor-to-ceiling glass forming a stunning backdrop to the luxe walk-in rain shower, in addition to a freestanding bath, stylish twin wall-hung vanity with soft-close drawers, ambient lighting and underfloor heating. The adjacent powder room is just as aesthetically pleasing.
Designed to ensure optimum comfort and convenience, the home also lists; highly functional laundry fitted with overhead cupboards and stone benchtops, gas ducted heating, ceiling fans, LED lights, double gates to rear, spacious garage with workshop/storage and large grassy backyard for children and pets.
Situated within close walking distance to Ringwood East Railway Station, Maroondah Hospital, Ringwood East Child Care and Kindergarten, Tintern Grammar, Cheong Park with barbeque area and playground, bus stop, as well as being in close reach of Burnt Bridge Shopping Centre, EastLink freeway, Eastland, Tinternvale Primary School, Ringwood Secondary College and Aquinas College.
Set on a large 888m2 (approx.) block, this impressive residence is sure to exceed your expectations.

Opportunities like this rarely become available. If you are looking to move into the perfect family home then look no further as this is one residence that will surpass all of your expectations.
